item.title: Yes, but what are Gaussian Processes?
item.description: Part I of a conceptual introduction to Gaussian processes, focusing on understanding GPs as stochastic processes.

item.title: Modeling Seasonal Variation in Fuel Consumption
item.description: Simple time series model of fuel comsumption at power plants.

item.title: How Much Carbon Do Pennsylvania Electricity Plants Emit?
item.description: EDA on electricity plants in Pennsylvania using the tidyverse and the eia package.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Matt. (caption: Me and my charmed family) I recently graduated from Pitt with a Masters in Applied Statistics. I got to work on some exciting projects, I’m working on some others, and I’m looking to work on more. Here I’ll be blogging mostly with R and Python about my interests in climate and the justice system, with some tips, reflections, and art along the way. Thanks to the blogdown package by Yihui Xie, and the lithium theme by Jonathan Rutheiser.
